text:
London, UK - DEVOPS ENGINEERS - Automation Logic (www.automationlogic.com) - ONSITE / Permanent Employment

Automation Logic is a leading European professional services firm providing consultancy and support to large enterprises in the field of data centre automation.

Automation Logic are hiring DevOps Engineers from varying background at varying levels of seniority.

The interview process - telephone screening -> technical test -> face to face interview -> offer

If you are interested please feel free to apply by emailing fazan.habib@automationlogic.com
